critique:
The document is a formal executive order addressing equality of treatment and opportunity in the armed services. It aims to convey a sense of justice, fairness, and resolve. It expresses a commitment to democracy and equality. The emotions conveyed are primarily related to justice and resolve, with a touch of hope for a better future. Therefore, I will score it as follows:

Joy: 3 (reflecting the hope for a more equitable future)
Sadness: 2 (acknowledging the past inequalities)
Fear: 1 (not a prominent emotion in this document)
Disgust: 1 (not a prominent emotion in this document)
Surprise: 1 (not a prominent emotion in this document)
